title: Car Evaluation
description: Car Evaluation dataset - categorize cars into unacceptable, acceptable, good and very-good categories based on car attributes, all of which are categorical.

id.name: id
id.description: Unique identifier for each sample in the dataset.

target.name: evaluation
target.description: Car evaluation into categories: [unacc, acc, good, v-good]

features.name: buying
features.description: overall price category:  low, med, high, vhigh

features.name: maint
features.description: category of price of the maintenance: low, med, high, vhigh

features.name: persons
features.description: capacity in terms of persons to carry: 2, 4, more

features.name: lug_boot
features.description: category for the size of luggage boot: small, med, big

features.name: safety
features.description: category for estimated safety of the car: low, med, high
